author: Mark Wycislik-Wilson
title: Google's Covid-19 tracker will be delivered to your Android phone via Google Play
description: Google reveals how the virus-tracing tool it's developing with Apple will be distributed.
content:
There have been some unexpected side-effects to the coronavirus pandemic, including the teaming up of Google and Apple to provide information to the public about the spread of the disease.
But while we've known for a few days about the two companies working … [+1829 chars]
